rooms.description: A spacious entry that aligns with Vastu principles, allowing a smooth flow of energy.
Open-plan living area with Kerala-style woodwork and natural ventilation for comfortable gatherings.
Adjacent to the kitchen, designed for family meals and conversation, maintaining spatial harmony.
Well-equipped kitchen with modern amenities integrated into traditional Kerala design aesthetics.
Master bedroom with an attached bathroom, ensuring privacy and tranquility.
Second bedroom designed for the children or guest use, aligning with Vastu principles for optimal energy flow.
Shared bathroom attached to master bedroom, designed with space efficiency and privacy in mind.
Designated private gym area, equipped for fitness activities, ensuring soundproofing and ample ventilation.

openings.description: The main entrance designed to face north as per Vastu guidelines, providing a welcoming energy flow.
Entry to the two-car garage ensuring easy access and adherence to local norms.
Service exit for utilities and maintenance aligned with building regulations.

garden.description: A spacious garden area incorporating native plants, water features and outdoor seating areas to enhance natural beauty.

garage.description: Two-car garage designed with ample space for vehicles and storage.
